headline: Private Equity World Engulfed by Perfect Storm
summary: Tariff-related market turmoil dashes investors’ hopes for payouts​ as dealmaking grinds to a near standstill.

headline: Apollo Announces Changes to its Board of Directors
summary: Gary Cohn to join the Board as Lead Independent Director Outgoing Chair and Lead Independent Director Jay Clayton assuming role as interim US Attorney for SDNY NEW YORK, April 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo (NYSE: APO) today announced changes to its Board of Directors. Financial services leader Gary Cohn has been appointed to the Board as Lead Independent Director. headline: AI Search Loves Press Releases—Here’s Why
summary: NEW YORK, April 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WHAT: Webinar - Maximizing Search Visibility: The New Role of Press Releases in AI Search Engines With AI-powered search prioritizing authoritative sources and verified facts, press releases now play a bigger role than ever in communications strategies. In our special webinar, you’ll learn how releases directly influence AI search rankings and how to optimize yours for maximum visibility.
